questions.question_text:
Cloud Kicks wants to decrease the workload for its customer care agents by implementing a chatbot on its website that partially deflects incoming cases by answering frequently asked questions.
Which field of AI is most suitable for this scenario?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
To avoid bias and other ethical risks, the Einstein Email Engagement Scoring model doesn't include demographic data.

the answer should be C 
see https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.mc_anb_EES_email_model_card.htm&language=en_US&type=5#:~:text=Review%20the%20ethical%20factors%20associated,doesn't%20include%20demographic%20data.

questions.question_text: Which data does Salesforce automatically exclude from Marketing Cloud Einstein engagement model training to mitigate bias and ethical risks?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Correct Answer is B.

Correct answer is B: Honesty: When collecting data to train and evaluate our models, we need to respect data provenance and ensure that we have consent to use data (e.g., open-source, user-provided). https://www.salesforce.com/news/stories/generative-ai-guidelines/

Selected Answer: A
A. Control bias, toxicity, and harmful content with embedded guardrails and guidance.

questions.question_text: Which statement exemplifies Salesforce's honesty guideline when training AI models?

choices.B: Ensure appropriate consent and transparency when using AI- generated responses.
choices.A: Control bias, toxicity, and harmful content with embedded guardrails and guidance.
choices.C: Minimize the AI model's carbon footprint and environmental impact during training.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. Potential for human bias in machine learning algorithms and the lack of transparency in AI decision-making processes

choices.A: Implicit transparency of AI systems, which makes it easy for users to understand and trust their decisions
choices.C: Inherent neutrality of AI systems, which eliminates any potential for human bias in decision-making
choices.B: Potential for human bias in machine learning algorithms and the lack of transparency in AI decision-making processes

questions.question_text: What are some of the ethical challenges associated with AI development?

choices.B: Establish an ethical and unbiased culture amongst those involved.
choices.A: Allow users to give feedback regarding the inferences the AI makes about them.
choices.C: Communicate AI goals and objectives with those involved prior to all interactions.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A. Allow users to give feedback regarding the inferences the AI makes about them.

questions.question_text: What is one way to achieve transparency in AI?
